title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 824.2 - Standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 824.2 - Standards

State Regulations
(a) Standards for
certification and regulation of any specialized service shall be developed by
the Office and may be unique to the service to be delivered by such specialized
service. Unless otherwise indicated, standards for any other program or service
certified, funded or otherwise authorized by the Office shall not apply to such
specialized service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
824.2

Adopted

New

York State Register February 3, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 05, eff. 2/3/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
